entry.value: SELECT name FROM sys.databases WHERE name NOT IN ('master', 'tempdb', 'model', 'msdb')

SELECT distinct name FROM [db_name].sys.schemas WHERE name NOT IN ('db_owner', 'db_accessadmin', 'db_securityadmin', 'db_ddladmin', 'db_backupoperator', 'db_datareader', 'db_datawriter', 'db_denydatareader', 'db_denydatawriter', 'information_schema', 'sys') ORDER BY 1
SELECT TABLE_CATALOG as db, table_schema AS schema_name, table_name, table_type FROM [db_name].INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES ORDER BY TABLE_CATALOG, TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_NAME
